predicate.note: Frames file for 'impeach' based on sentences in wsj and automatic expansion via verbnet.

roleset.name: try an elected official for a crime, remove same

example.name: passive
example.text: Mr. Hastings's case was particularly nettlesome because it marked the first time a federal official was impeached *trace* and removed from office on charges of which a jury had acquitted him.
example.arg: charges of which a jury had acquitted him

example.name: all args
example.text: The internal investigation also impeached MiniScribe's auditors, Coopers & Lybrand, for allegedly ignoring numerous red flags.
